titles: The great assize; or, Christ's certain and sudden appearance to judgement. Being serious considerations on these four things, death, judgment, heaven, and hell. By Mr. Stevens, minister. To the tune of, Aim not too high, &c. Licensed according to order.
author: Stevens, Minister.
publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball in Pye-corner, near West-Smithfield.,
notes: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Here is presented, clearly to the eye ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
